gameSettings

类 GameRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameSettings.GameRecord

  • public class GameRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    The class is used when a level is complete, the game is complete or Save Score function is used.

    When a level is complete, it shows the first 3 high score player, and current player's score.

    When the game is complete or Save Score function is used, the player can enter his name and record the score.

    作者:
    Lekang Jiang

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      GameRecord(java.lang.String mapname, int level, int move)
      Constructor Initialise class variables.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void confirmname()
      When player enter a name and click confirm, close the pop up window and record the score to file.
      void enterName()
      Pop up a new window that allows player to enter name and record the scores.
      void record()
      Record the current player's score to a permanent score list.
      void show()
      Show the first 3 highest player with scores, and the current player's score.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GameRecord

        public GameRecord(java.lang.String mapname,
                  int level,
                  int move)
        Constructor

        Initialise class variables. If game is complete, enterName() function is called and read the past record to content

        参数:
        mapname -
        level -
        move -

    • 方法详细资料

      • enterName

        public void enterName()
        Pop up a new window that allows player to enter name and record the scores.

      • confirmname

        public void confirmname()
        When player enter a name and click confirm, close the pop up window and record the score to file.

      • record

        public void record()
        Record the current player's score to a permanent score list.

        The list is ordered by levels achieved. If the level is the same, less movements would have higher score.

      • show

        public void show()
        Show the first 3 highest player with scores, and the current player's score.
